records.Message:
Reference Number:  {!Case.CaseNumber} 

Hi {!Account.FirstName},

This is a message from the Victorian Department of Health and Human Services. You have been assessed as a secondary close contact who has been exposed to coronavirus (COVID-19). Please immediately quarantine.

We will call you soon from a private number. Please answer. If you need an interpreter, call TIS National on 131 450.

Visit {!Case.SurveyLinkURL__c} for directions regarding your quarantine. If you are under 18, this information is directed to your parent/guardian.

The department will never ask for payments, for your financial details, or ask you to download software. If you have any questions, call us on 1300 651 160.
